about_the_game:
Experience the ultimate sensation of gliding through the sky!

Glider Sim is a professional Paragliding and Hang Gliding simulator built for real pilots in mind and is aiming to achieve photorealistic graphics! You can fly in Free Flight mode, Multiplayer mode or Challenges. The sim can be played outside VR or inside VR. We recommend playing in Virtual Reality as it provides the highest level of immersion!

Glider Types

The sim includes 5 types of gliders:

  • Paraglider

  • Paramotor

  • Mini-Wing,

  • Speed Wing

  • Hang Glider

  • Additional FPV (First Person View) Racing Drone.

The FPV Racing Drone has 3 flight modes including: Auto Hover, Angle and Acro.

Scenery

3 default maps are included:

  • Sun Valley, ID, United States

  • Walenstadt - Switzerland (Swiss Alps)

  • Grand Tetons, USA.

The scenery is derived from real world satellite imagery and overlaid with high resolution textures, grass, trees and wildflowers! The scenery also includes custom placed roads, houses, buildings, power lines, soaring eagles, cruising airplanes and more! Each map has 100+ launch points to choose from!

Earth Online Plus - World Steaming Service (30 day free trial included):

This is a premium paid feature that allows full access to the entire planet! Powered by Cesium terrain streaming technology and Google Photorealistic 3D Tiles. A 30-day free trial is included with Glider Sim, after that  a subscription or access pass is required for this service. 

Weather System:

Experience the realism of our meticulously crafted wind and thermal system in the Glider Sim. Tailor your flying conditions by adjusting the wind direction and strength, as well as the time of day. Watch as the sun angle and terrain types dynamically influence thermal activity and cloud formation. Our synchronized weather system ensures a consistent experience across multiplayer sessions, allowing you to share the skies with friends.

Harness the power of ridge lift and thermals to extend your flight, and toggle wind particles on or off to visualize the invisible forces at play. This feature is an invaluable training tool for novice glider pilots, providing a clear understanding of wind currents.

Adding to the immersion, you'll find eagles soaring through the skies, instinctively seeking out and riding the thermals. Join them in the dance of the winds and master the art of gliding in Glider Sim.

Flight Physics:

Experience state of the art flight physics where each cell of the glider is modeled and has physics applied! You can do maneuvers such as wingovers, spirals, stalls, and swoops. Watch out and don't let your wing collapse!

Scored Challenges:

Each map includes a list of Scored Challenges you can fly to put your flying skills to the test! Challenges include Speed Flying challenges, and XC (Cross Country) Races with more coming soon. Each challenge includes monthly leaderboards so you can compare with where you skills stand amongst all the other pilots in the world!

More features we hope to add to the game during Early Access is as follows:

  • More Scored Challenges/ Missions.

    Don't forget to share this experience with your fellow gliding enthusiasts and we look forward to hearing your feedback in the community hub as we continue development!

    See you in the skies!

    --------Special Note ---------
    If you are interested in using Glider Sim in a commercial setting, or creating Hang Gliding or Paragliding Simulators we have a separate edition called Glider Sim - Pro Edition. It includes extra control modes, telemetry data output and tools to be used in a commercial setting. website to learn more.

Experience the ultimate sensation of gliding through the sky!

Glider Sim is a professional Paragliding and Hang Gliding simulator built for real pilots in mind and is aiming to achieve photorealistic graphics! The FPV Racing Drone has 3 flight modes including: Auto Hover, Angle and Acro.

    If you are interested in using Glider Sim in a commercial setting, or creating Hang Gliding or Paragliding Simulators we have a separate edition called Glider Sim - Pro Edition. It includes extra control modes, telemetry data output and tools to be used in a commercial setting. website to learn more.
legal_notice:
Glider Sim Terms of Service
1. User Responsibility
Users of Glider Sim are solely responsible for their decisions and actions. Glider Sim is a simulation tool designed to provide an experience of paragliding and hang gliding but cannot determine the suitability of any real-world paragliding or hang gliding conditions. Only an experienced and properly trained pilot can make such decisions. Glider Sim is designed to help you enhance your simulation experience; however, a properly trained pilot must make the final decision to fly or not to fly in real life!
2. Accuracy and Information Disclaimer
Glider Sim does not guarantee the accuracy or correctness of the information and simulated data presented within the app/game. The simulated maps, weather conditions, and other data are provided for virtual experience purposes only. Any conclusions drawn from information in Glider Sim are the sole responsibility of the user.
3. Limitation of Liability
In no event will Glider Sim, its developers, partners, or representatives be liable for any damages, including but not limited to direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, fatalities, injuries, accidents, or losses arising in connection with the use of Glider Sim or any linked website or services. This includes, without limitation, any failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, defect, delay in operation, transmission, or system failure, even if Glider Sim, its partners, or representatives are advised of the possibility of such damages, losses, or expenses.
4. Health and Safety Warnings
VR experiences can be physically and mentally demanding. Users should take regular breaks, ensure they are in a safe environment, and stop use immediately if they experience dizziness, nausea, discomfort, eye strain, or any other adverse symptoms. By using Glider Sim, users acknowledge the potential risks of VR use, including those related to physical movement and visual immersion. Users are responsible for using the app safely.
5. Assumption of Risk
By using Glider Sim, users acknowledge and assume all risks associated with VR simulations, including potential physical, mental, and emotional impacts. Glider Sim provides a simulated environment that does not replicate real-world flight dynamics exactly and should not be relied upon for actual paragliding or hang gliding training or decision-making.
6. Privacy and Data Collection
Glider Sim may collect non-personal data, such as usage patterns and performance metrics, to improve the app and user experience. For more information, users can review our Privacy Policy, which outlines the types of data collected and how it is used. Glider Sim does not share personal information without user consent, except as required by law.
7. Modifications and Updates
Glider Sim may undergo updates, modifications, or removal of features without prior notice. Users understand that certain features or functions may change as part of ongoing development, and the developers have no obligation to maintain specific features. Continued use of Glider Sim after updates signifies acceptance of these modifications.
8. Termination of Access
Glider Sim reserves the right to restrict, suspend, or terminate access to the app without notice if users violate any terms outlined in this agreement, misuse the app, or engage in any harmful activities toward the app, community, or other users.
9. Intellectual Property
All content within Glider Sim, including but not limited to software, artwork, logos, and design elements, is the intellectual property of [Your Company/Name] and protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized reproduction, modification, or distribution is prohibited without explicit permission.
10. Third-Party Services and Links
Glider Sim may integrate or link to third-party services or websites, such as multiplayer platforms or online leaderboards. Glider Sim does not endorse or assume responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of third-party services. Users acknowledge they use such services at their own risk and should review any applicable third-party terms.
11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Washington State, United States of America. Any disputes arising from or related to Glider Sim shall be resolved in the courts of Washington State, United States of America.
name: Glider Sim

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $149.99 at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $14.99.

package_groups.title: Buy Glider Sim Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 22 GB available space

short_description: Experience the ultimate sensation of gliding through the sky! Built for real glider pilots in mind this simulator is as close to real as it gets. The sim can be played outside VR or inside VR.
